alert.note: Alert for Butte; Lawrence (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 1:47PM MDT until May 30 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Butte County in northwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Lawrence County in west central South Dakota... East central Crook County in northeastern Wyoming... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 147 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Beulah, or 12 miles west of Spearfish, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Beulah and Vore Buffalo Jump. This includes... Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 1 and 7. Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 200 and 207. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
